name: VEX Nothing But Net
description: The VEX Nothing But Net App is the ideal competition companion for teams, spectators, and event planners involved in the 2015-2016 VEX Robotics Competition season. The app provides quick access to the official game manual with search capability, including in-app alerts when new versions of the manual are released. Additionally, a helpful scoring calculator for Nothing But Net is provided for use during practice matches or while evaluating game strategies.
